description: Describes the relief operation carried out jointly by trhe United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and the League of Red Cross Societies on behalf of 200,000 Algerian refugees in Morocco and Tunisia. It is dedicated to all those who through their support made possible this humanitarian action. Commentary by Yul Brynner.
